title: Municipality Finance issues EUR 10 million notes and a GBP 65 million tap under its MTN programme - Yahoo Finance
content: Municipality Finance issues EUR 10 million notes and a GBP 65 million tap under its MTN programme  Yahoo Finance
description: Municipality Finance PlcStock exchange release 1 February 2022 at 10:00 am (EET) Municipality Finance issues EUR 10 million notes and a GBP 65 million tap under its MTN programme On 2 February 2022 Municipality Finance Plc issues EUR 10 million notes and a new tranche in an amount of GBP 65 million to an existing benchmark issued on 17 March 2021. The notes are issued under MuniFinâ€™s EUR 40 billion programme for the issuance of debt instruments. The offering circular and the supplemental offerin
